浕字的基本解释

浕
（濜）
jìn
〔浕水〕ａ．水名，在中国湖北省枣阳县；ｂ．水名，在中国陕西省勉县。
（濜）

浕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jìn］
［《廣韻》徐刃切，去震，邪。］
“浕1”的繁体字。
(1)水名。在湖北省枣阳市境。
(2)水名。在陕西省勉县境。参阅北魏郦道元《水经注·沔水上》。
[②]［jìn］
［《廣韻》慈忍切，上軫，從。］
“浕2”的繁体字。
见“濜2溳”。
[③]［jīn］
［《廣韻》將鄰切，平真，精。］
“浕3”的繁体字。
津液。

浕字的康熙字典解释

浕字的起名意思

中国水名。

Basic explanation of words
Chao
(濜)
jìn
[Chaoshui] a. The name of the water, in Zaoyang County, Hubei Province, China; b. The name of the water is in Mian County, Shaanxi Province, China.
(濜)
Chao
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jìn］
["Guangyun" Xu blade cuts, to shake, evil. ]
Traditional characters for "浕1".
(1) Water name. In Zaoyang City, Hubei Province.
(2) Water name. In Mian County, Shaanxi Province. Refer to Li Daoyuan's "Shui Jing Zhu · Mian Shui" in the Northern Wei Dynasty.
[②]［jìn］
["Guangyun" Compassionate, patience, Shang Zhen, Cong. ]
Traditional characters for "浕2".
See "濜2涢".
[③]［jīn］
["Guang Yun" cuts neighbors, plain and precise. ]
Traditional characters for "浕3".
body fluid.
